message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to your business. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to let it go for $1,250,000, which is a significant discount considering its potential.  This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
